org.openhubframework.openhub.spi.quartz

Interface TriggerFactory

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AnnotationMethodTriggerFactory

    public interface TriggerFactory
    Factory class for creating new Triggers instance.

    Every trigger instance is able to running concurrent in all nodes in cluster at the same time (JobExecuteTypeInCluster.CONCURRENT) or in exact node in cluster (JobExecuteTypeInCluster.NOT_CONCURRENT). This execution type can be set in job definition QuartzJob.executeTypeInCluster().

    Since:
    2.0
    Author:
    Roman Havlicek
    See Also:
    Trigger, JobExecuteTypeInCluster, QuartzJob, QuartzSimpleTrigger, QuartzCronTrigger

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      List<org.quartz.Trigger> createTriggers(JobExecuteTypeInCluster jobExecuteTypeInCluster)
      Create new Triggers instances for cluster execute type.

    • Method Detail

      • createTriggers

        List<org.quartz.Trigger> createTriggers(JobExecuteTypeInCluster jobExecuteTypeInCluster)
        Create new Triggers instances for cluster execute type.

        jobExecuteTypeInCluster - execute type for which Triggers will be created
        Returns:
        new Triggers
